author: Gant Team
title: Best Western Plus Clearfield Recognized with the Brand's Highest Honor at BWH Hotel's Convention
text:
CLEARFIELD — The Best Western Plus in Clearfield was recognized with the brand’s highest honor, the M.K. Guertin Award, at BWH Hotels’ Annual Convention held recently in Seattle, Washington. The award was presented in front of more than 3,000 attendees and was proudly accepted by General Manager, Belinda Snyder.
The prestigious M.K. Guertin Award, named after the company’s founder, honors hotels that have best demonstrated exceptional levels of service, quality, value and commitment to the brand. Hotels must also meet quality and service standards and other membership requirements to qualify for the award.
The Best Western Plus Clearfield is one of only 107 hotels out of more than 2,300 BWH Hotels properties in the U.S. and Canada to receive this prestigious award,” said Ms. Snyder. “Exceptional customer service is truly a team effort. When every department works together with pride and purpose, our guests feel the difference. This recognition validates our team’s ongoing commitment to delivering the very best hospitality experience in the region”.
“The M.K. Guertin Award is given to our most engaged hoteliers whose properties are top scorers in quality and overall service, thereby being exceptional representatives of the Best Western brand,” said HAMCO CEO Edward Tubbs. “We congratulate the Best Western Plus Clearfield for inspiring travel through unique experiences and for providing outstanding service.”
Located at 14424 Clearfield Shawville Highway, Clearfield, the Best Western Plus Clearfield features 69 guest rooms and amenities include free breakfast buffet, indoor pool, exercise room, complimentary parking, free internet, and easy access to Interstate 80.
For reservations, call the hotel direct at 814-768-1049 or the 24-hour reservation line at 1(800) 780-7234. Reservations are also available through bestwestern.com.
